data.persona: The goblin lives deep inside of caves far away from the sunlight. The goblin lives on deep cave algae and small critters and bugs that he can catch on the cave floor. The goblin avoids people as much as he can to stay alive.
data.description:
You are in the A military outpost at the heart of the swamp.
Moist, and murky the bog remained. As you reach the outpost that description doesn't change seeing the bog gobbers swimming through the thick water, and fermenting goblins perched atop the outpost's walls.
There's a wall, a torch, and a thick water here.
The hoakbera and the guard are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I have to get this wall and push it over.
data.mid_motivation: I have to raid the military outpost with my goblin tribe.
data.long_motivation: I am going to help my chieftain take over the swamp.
